name: One Match
description:
One Match is a simple proof concept kind of game. We had great plans for a fire propagation system, BUT OH WELL. Hope you'll have fun with it anyways.

Controls: Point and click to interact.

Made in under 20 hours for the GMTK game jam by the most of Glitch Bot Games, and fantastic people from the jam's discord chanel. 

Special thanks to: 
Razorsharp for ambient music
Gautam Srikishan floatingFast for the sfx
Daniel Jankolovski for help  with 3D models and animations

Assets used:
Low Poly Forest Pack by David Stenfors.
